title: New Haven Motor Scooter Beating
subtitle: Rumor: Photograph shows a service technician who was dragged off a motor scooter and beaten by a mob of 'Trayvon crazed thugs.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Photograph shows a service technician who was dragged off a motor scooter and beaten by a mob of “Trayvon crazed thugs.”
